name: Elections Commission - Y. M. S. Bandara of the Galgamuwa Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - M. A. S. Kumari of the Kuliyapitiya Urban Council has vacated her member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - P. W. G. J. N. Fernando, of the Kuliyapitiya Urban Council has vacated member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna
